replies.body: There's the daily "Zed is OP" post I was looking for. Good to know I'm still on these shitty boards and not in some weird alternate dimension.
He could be making a joke.  Look at his name.

> He could be making a joke.  Look at his name.

I didn't consider that. I'm ashamed that I underestimated the wit of a random OP on the Gameplay boards. I'm just so used to the salt and rage that I end up missing the more dry humor.
